review:
While "Foreign Legion: Buckets of Blood" was an "okay" game (until a bug appeared and couldn't continue the campaign!), this one in the other hand it's bad from the beginning...
Since it's multiplayer and it's dead (I wonder why...), doesn't worth a dime nowadays. 
Playing offline against bots in this case it's just lame.
You can do that in the og game if you wish, you can skip this one easily.

author: {'steamid': '76561198186530370', 'num_games_owned': 2632, 'num_reviews': 571, 'playtime_forever': 1369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1369, 'last_played': 1672807033}
review:
I'll admit that I'm a bit biased towards this game as I'm aware that it has it's hick ups in the gameplay department, mostly do one button being assigned to a couple of actions, so sometimes when you want to hide behind cover, your character will try to melee it instead etc.

However that can be overlooked do to the game being a real delight for anyone who loves multiplayer through gameplay. I would advise to avoid any Spoilers and experience the game with a clean slate and then playing it again to sea all the foreshadowing as far as the opening titles.

If you are tired of every modern military shooter being the same old thing, Foreign Legion: Multi Massacre may provide you with a breath of fresh air.

So grab a gun and kill some bad guys... there are no consequences........ It wasn't your fault.................................. You are a hero!..................... YOU ARE A HERO!!!!!!................. I AM THE HERO!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................ It wasn't my fault!................................................. help me.

La jouabilitÃ©, au clavier et Ã  la souris, est plutÃ´t bonne, avec des contrÃ´les simples et intuitifs, et qui peuvent Ãªtre modifiÃ©s via le menu apparaissant avant chaque lancement du jeu. MalgrÃ© lâ€™absence dâ€™une campagne, la diversitÃ© proposÃ©e est satisfaisante : 6 cartes, 6 modes de jeu, 4 niveaux de difficultÃ© par mode de jeu, pas mal dâ€™armes et un minimum de personnalisation de son personnage ; seule la diversitÃ© dâ€™ennemis est faible. Hormis 2 modes de jeu exclusivement multijoueur, le jeu peut se faire seul et est adaptÃ© Ã  de petites sessions, grÃ¢ce notamment Ã  son cotÃ© rapide et dÃ©foulant. Malheureusement, Foreign Legion: Multi Massacre, comme son nom lâ€™indique, est pensÃ© pour du multijoueur et câ€™est lÃ  le problÃ¨me car il nâ€™y a absolument personne en ligne avec qui jouer, dâ€™oÃ¹ cette Ã©valuation nÃ©gative. author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11126, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1703876576}
review:
Foreign Legion Multi Massacre is a multiplayer survival third person shooter where waves of undead creatures attack you and you and your friends have to hold them off. 

There's not much gameplay here, it's just waves of enemies.   Controls and graphics can't be customised which is a minimum requirement for any PC game to be taken seriously.  The game decided my HOTAS was a gamepad and kept changing weapons constantly.  There was no way to remap controls to stop this.  

The developers didn't put in a basic effort to make this game fit properly on PC.  I can't recommend it to anyone.

review:
Tags: Multiplayer Based
Additional Tags: Delete Local Content & Remove from Library

TLDR: No solo content. Dead. 

Over the shoulder wave survival with checkpoint defense. Limited ammo. Spawning zombies must be dismembered and are immune in the torso. Getting grinded down to pistols and melee would probably require good teamwork. Game is dead with no one online and no single player mode. Removed for declutter.

author: {'steamid': '76561198175798941', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 569, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 569, 'last_played': 1499429999}
review:
Una vez dije que si lo recomendaba... pero la verdad e cambiado de opinion
Â¿Te digo porque?

Foreign Legion: Multi Massacre es la secuela de Foreign Legion: Buckets of Blood
solo que con unos pocos accesorios de decoraciÃ³n de personaje nuevos, un modo
Zombie con 1 solo mapa y el modo multijugador al que solo se puede jugar en
single player ya que a nadie le interesa jugar este juego.

E probado la versiÃ³n pirata y tiene menos mapas pero sin embargo es posible
jugar al multi jugador(Si piensan comprar el juego les recomiendo antes probar
la versiÃ³n pirata ya que les dara un pequeÃ±o indicio de como es el juego).

Ahora la pregunta es Â¿el juego vale tu dinero? NO
Los desarrolladores solo publicaron el juego, portearon un par de cosas de la
entrega anterior y cobraron su dinero; no arreglaron bugs, ni agregaron
actualizaciones, mapas, ni nada nuevo que te de ganas de volver a jugar.

ConclusiÃ³n: juega la versiÃ³n pirata, la culpa no es del jugador sino de los
desarrolladores quienes desde 2012, siquiera se preocuparon por arreglar
pequeÃ±os bugs en los mapas.

PuntuaciÃ³n 4/10

Adicional:
La primera entrega no ofrece mucho pero es mejor,
si la encuentras en oferta puede que valga la pena.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966548833', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 74, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 74, 'last_played': 1459363450}
review:
I gave the original game "[url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/36000/]Foreign Legion: Buckets of Blood[/url]" a thumbs down, but thought it could be a decent little game with a bit more effort.
This sequel doesn't see that effort having been done; It seems to wholesale reuse the weapons, character system and maps from the original game, with the only substantive addition being multiplayer.
I don't feel like there's anything new here, and it doesn't feel like an improvement over the original, which it needed to be.
It feels like it's a game made for a younger audience (under 12's ?), yet it has an 18+ rating on it, which baffles me now that I noticed it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119057120', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 264, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 66, 'last_played': 1440880344}
review:
This is a cartoony shooter with a heavy focus on multiplayer.

Pros:
- graphics are nice
- shooting is fun
- zombie stage is actually good, I liked to play it the most

Cons:
- first and foremost - the game is basically dead when it comes to multiplayer, I managed to play with one other player during whole session
- you need to grind in this game in order to buy better guns
- beside zombie level and maybe town level other maps are just so bad (singleplayer perspective)
- it doesn't seems like this game would be reanimated

Heh, this might have been funny little multiplayer shooter. It got killed by grinding and lack of players. As one reviewer noticed - "It's great to pass a bit of time, to play with friends and to loosen up a bit, but it's only worth buying on sales. Other than that, don't bother.". 

Couldn't agree more.

author: {'steamid': '76561197966822965', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 473, 'last_played': 1690300565}
review:
It makes fun for 10-15min for a short multiplayer game.
The difference to the original single player one? Nothing. They just added the multiplayer, I think 1 or 2 new maps and that's it mostly. 

With other words: If you only play single player and have the first game, don't buy this. If you wanna play it with some friends, buy this one. 

I bought it in a bundle on sale, so the price was fine for me. I play it really rarely with some friends, that's what the game is for.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025468901', 'num_games_owned': 2459, 'num_reviews': 531, 'playtime_forever': 7, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1416193834}
review:
Looks neat. I see control systems. I see multiplayer. I see news (whcih is empty and crashes the game).
But I see no single player. And I see no people playing multiplayer.
And none of my friends owns the game.

I declare it underpopulated, and shoddy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035285721', 'num_games_owned': 5114, 'num_reviews': 1098, 'playtime_forever': 648, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 648, 'last_played': 1405639111}
review:
Like FL: Buckets of Blood this game continues with the "high quality" of game design.
It's amazing how the gameplay has evolved - not. There are new maps, but also some of the old ones. 

A lot of achievements are like to kill 500 of every creature and thing. That means kill dolphins, prerie dogs, pigeons, zombies,  soldiers, pumpkins, tombstones ... weird but also easy to do. MP is actually dead. For MP achievements you'll surely need some friends to get them unlocked. 

Remains just one question: Why I'm always so good in this s*** games?

review:
It is smooth, my only gripe is the positioning of the crosshairs and the guy on the screen. I hate the shoulder view.  It is a piss off. 

Seems like enemies can hit you from across the map with a pistol. 

Also it is Only multiplayer, but no one plays it. So Its you playing by yourself. 

Wish I didnt buy it.

Once multiplayer is fixed it will be a top game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198126975019', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 747, 'playtime_forever': 187, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1654003405}
review:
Foreign Legion isn't as bad as some people make it appear, the game can get repetitive at times there are only a couple of game modes that traverse to just a few couple of different settings of scenery, however the importance about video games, and gameplay in this case, it's the formula, there isn't anything more important than the actual "formula" for gameplay, Mario has it, Gta has it, even Valve as a company has a very peculiar way of developing games.

Foreign Legion however, doesn't, and that's where it really fails to deliver or accomplish anything more than just beign your own personal time waster for here and there, there isn't anything that truly stand out more than the wonderful and joyful aesthetics along with the scenery in some levels (as i stated before). The game isn't a regretful purchase for myself, as a matter of fact i still play the game from time to time, but i only do it when i want to go passing by life, the game is just that, a time waster, nothing more and nothing less.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040914250', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 105, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1401128196}
review: Foreign Legion: Multi Massacre could have been a decent follow up to the original Foreign Legion: Buckets Of Blood, however the game has many flaws in its gameplay as well as terrible online play to boot, which is surprisly weird consider this game is focus on co-op and team death match. The online connection will vary, but from the little bits of playing this game online lag was noticeable. The graphics are ok with of course plenty of blood coming through your screens. I can only recommend this game when there is sale for this game but the enjoyment come from playing with your friends online, which sadly the game fails to delieve especillay if you have no friends to play as the online community for this game is a ghost house, since you can't find many people online. Even if you do mange to get a game going, you still face the many bug and glitches the game has compare to the original game (which is base on my experience).  5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198000099467', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 75, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1345791600}
review: Wow, this is one of the best shoot-'em-up action games I have ever played, with beautiful graphics, especially the particle effects. For an only MP game I found myself loving the deep and incredibly fun progression system and interesting maps obviously made by a skilled developer. Although this masterpiece falls a bit short to compete for my GOTY award, it's still worth a buy, or maybe two, to support the developer. I can't wait for Foreign Legion 2! Buy this NOW!

author: {'steamid': '76561198044468782', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 40, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 37, 'last_played': 1398443569}
review:
I'm going to put this bluntly first: This game is quite possibly Hitler's last attempt to screw with humanity.

There is absolutely nothing that speaks for this game. The graphics are so bad that the intended cuteness, I assume, is completely lost and should be considered a case study for game designers who want to make a 'cutesy but gory game' - DO NOT DO IT LIKE THIS. I'm not even sure it could be categorized as a game, it's more a mental practice tool for those who are happy with everything and want to feel rage. Make no mistake, Foreign Legion: Multi Massacre can turn the mose calm valium crunching Buddhist monk into a rampaging berserker monstrosity. There is no redeemable thing about this absolute and utter piece of crap, at least a crap can be flushed down, or at worst wiped away, but this speck of worthlessness will be a taint on my steam account forever. I can't even recommend you buying this for your worst enemy, the developers might actually think that they did something good, and will aim to push out one more of these devil spawns.

author: {'steamid': '76561198064156757', 'num_games_owned': 3338, 'num_reviews': 380, 'playtime_forever': 39035, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19976, 'last_played': 1670756633}
review:
Foreign Legion: Multi Massacre is the (far too) long awaited follow up to Buckets of Blood. Now you can continue the cartoon-style third person battle online and battle your friends, enemies or even frenemies across 6 maps and various modes. Reduce the never-ending army of a non-descriptive country to a bloody, meaty pulp (with extra zest!) as legionnaires of an even less described country.

So what are you waiting for, get ready to make mince meat of other players, battle endless forces, determine the biologic equation, host a nice pick nick or swim in the ocean.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119518429', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1389654616}
review:
Well this game comes in the Indie Genre and is really fun-filled.Acutally i haven't played Foreign Legion:Buckets of Blood.While on sale these games were cheap like almost 0.50$ was the difference between the two games.I bought Multi Massacre because it came out later and seemed more intresting.
------------------------------------------------------Good Points------------------------------------------------------------------
-More then 6 Stages
-Compete with Zombies As well as humans
-In-game shop to purchase items with virtual currency
-Fun-filled and good ragdoll.
--------------------------------------------------------Bad Points----------------------------------------------------------------
-No story
-Only Multiplayer Mode but can be played single player
-game gets bugged and the fonts start blinking and it becomes tough to read.


Overall game is good.

Recommended
8/10

review:
Foreign Legion, que dire:
Il ne vaut clairement pas son prix. Je l'ai achetÃ© en solde et heureusement, car mÃªme pour 2 petits euros, si c'Ã©tait a refaire, et bien.. je ne le referais pas!
Je l'ai achetÃ© pour son aspect petit jeu sympa a jouer en multi, et bien les devellopeurs ont dues oublier le cotÃ© "sympa". 
On nous lache dans une map infestÃ©e de zombies cartoonesques, ok, mais les explications des touches, des objectifs et du mode de jeu, je les attends toujours.
 
Bref, une copie bidon de call of en mode zombie.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068751546', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 65, 'playtime_forever': 490, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 490, 'last_played': 1409884722}
review:
No es un juego de tirar cohetes, no lo recomiendo demasiado, si pagas por el 2â‚¬ o menos, esta bien por ese precio, te echaras unas horas de diversiÃ³n, pero mÃ¡s de 2â‚¬ por el serÃ­a una estafa.
Tiene mapas multijugador de 4 jugadores, y tambien de 6 jugadores (creo que tambiÃ©n hay mapas de 9 jugadores en multijugador), el problema es que no hay casi nadie para jugar en multi, el juego tiene pocos mapas, se hace aburrido tras jugar unas 6-8 horas de juego por la falta de variedad, las horas se pueden ver alargadas si tienes con quien jugar, si juegas solo te aburriras muy pronto, y no esperes encontrar partidas en multi, pocas veces hay alguna.
El nivel mÃ¡ximo (creo) es 30, en el nivel 30 te dan la ultima arma, el nivel tambiÃ©n sirve para comprar nuevas personalizaciones para tu personaje.

author: {'steamid': '76561198022423272', 'num_games_owned': 1798, 'num_reviews': 66, 'playtime_forever': 368, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 368, 'last_played': 1387091644}
review:
This game is a gem.
It's not a game that you sink many hours in, but the time you spend in it is pure joy.

You instantly notice that GRIN were not held back in their creativity and madness.
So there was no blown up marketing department to say "Oh my god, we can't do this!"
They just did ;)

Show me another game in which it's an achievement to kill hundreds of dolphins.
Ya, we're talking this level of freedom in design.

All that said - i highly recommend getting it, but for full price only if you really
want to support GRIN. But with all those sales on Steam, it's just a question of time ;)

This may entertain you for about 2 hours, but donÂ´t expect anything else, the game is really not worth your money or time and I donÂ´t know what to love about besides the humour + the Multi Massacre is a bug Massacre as well. DO NOT BUY THESE!

author: {'steamid': '76561197967714806', 'num_games_owned': 895, 'num_reviews': 372, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 136, 'last_played': 1373150126}
review:
An update that arrived quite late, and didn't fully deliver all the initial promise.

However, it is well made and quite a blast to play if you can get other players.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992967892', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 41, 'playtime_forever': 1240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1240, 'last_played': 1366268400}
review: The late multiplayer followup to Buckets of Blood opens up the single-player game to the online masses, albeit in a shoddy and lazy manner. The gameplay, graphics and options are still the same as 3-years ago, with only a couple of new maps and a zombie mode to match. Despite the crude attempt and humor (terrorist dolphins and zombie chickens), the floaty gunplay and the repetitive action hastens this title's boring status within a couple of hours. 2/5

author: {'steamid': '76561198057331600', 'num_games_owned': 180, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 754, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 723, 'last_played': 1424197240}
review: Sono veramente rimasto colpito da che cosa puÃ² nascondere la copertina di questo titolo.Devo confessare che a prima vista pensai che fosse il classico gioco di serie B.GiÃ  le mie idee cambiarono quando vidi il trailer  e decisi di acquistarlo(sotto consiglio di Vesler) poichÃ¨ vedevo che conteneva tutti i generi:azione,survival horror, coop,ecc.Soldi spesi veramente bene ACCIDENTI! Gameplay:fantastico,meccaniche di gioco:semplici da imparare e punta del piccolo(purtroppo)diamante e la personalizzazzione direi abbastanza varia delle armi del personaggio.L'unico difettto(che poi non Ã¨ neanche del gioco) Ã¨ che bisogna avere almeno un altro amico con cui giocare poichÃ¨ da soli Ã¨ difficile e ammesso che siate bravi dopo poco stufa e poi Ã¨ veramente difficile trovare una partita in multiplayer anche solo con un altro giocatore.Consiglio caldamente di comprare questa piccola Perla(con la P maiuscola) perchÃ¨ merita veramente molto.

review:
This is a simple Multi-Player First Person Shooter by an indie game developer. The models are simple and the game play is straightforward BUT do not let that discourage you from picking up this game. I am VERY picky about the FPS Games I play but this game I found to be addictive. This has everything you need, bang bang shoot shoot along with humor and you can also upgrade your soldier with better weapons, gear and looks.

This is a indie sleeper hit!

author: {'steamid': '76561198001507811', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 67, 'playtime_forever': 583, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 180, 'last_played': 1548832297}
review: This is pretty much the original game (Buckets of Blood) but with multiplayer.  I love the way you can pimp out your character!  It's also cool to buy new weapons once you unlock them by leveling up.  After a little customization, you're ready to go out there and blow up dolphins with bombs strapped to them, suicide bombers running up to you with guns, chickens sitting on fences, birds flying in the air, and some other weird surprises lol.  It's quite an enjoyable game for the price it cost to buy it :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197986444501', 'num_games_owned': 1202, 'num_reviews': 80, 'playtime_forever': 69, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 69, 'last_played': 1341990000}
review: With regular lag, only three levels (one of which is just a shooting gallery), and only two gameplay modes, Foreign Legion is very much a niche game that I can't recommend. I hope that the developer continues to support the game since it does show promise in being a laid-back co-op shooter with a unique graphic style and charm, but as it stands there are  better free-to-play games available. Beyond that, I feel a bit swindled since screenshots elude to vehicle combat - which simply does not exist.
